About Me

About Me

Montana born and raised husband to one and father to four. I have a passion for making things great, and enjoy problem solving and creative thinking. A self-motivated hard worker with a drive to be the best. When I'm not coding you can find me making music, hiking, golfing, or most likely changing a diaper.
